strings.string:
Profile $1$ 1st connection
Please turn on your wheel
 and wait for connection

ensure only one wheel is ON!

If you enjoy this app :
 ko-fi.com/wheeldash
Button mapping to activity recording view (Profile 1)
Button mapping to activity recording view (Profile 2)
Button mapping to activity recording view (Profile 3)
Button mapping to cycle light mode (Profile 1)
Button mapping to cycle light mode (Profile 2)
Button mapping to cycle light mode (Profile 3)
Button mapping to wheel beep (horn mode) (Profile 1)
Button mapping to wheel beep (horn mode) (Profile 2)
Button mapping to wheel beep (horn mode) (Profile 3)
DONOTUSE Button mapping to wheel lock/unlock (Profile 1)
BLE command queuing delay (low value may cause app crash) (Profile 1)
BLE command queuing delay (low value may cause app crash) (Profile 2)
BLE command queuing delay (low value may cause app crash) (Profile 3)
Value should be in a range of 10 to 400
Value should be in a range of 0 to 120°C
UI refresh rate and in msec
Value should be in a range of 100 msec to 1000 msec
percentage threshold to color "top bar" with orange (Profile 1)
percentage threshold to color "top bar" with orange (Profile 2)
percentage threshold to color "top bar" with orange (Profile 3)
percentage threshold to color "top bar" bar with red (Profile 1)
percentage threshold to color "top bar" bar with red (Profile 2)
percentage threshold to color "top bar" bar with red (Profile 3)
Voltage Correction Factor (Gotway/Begode only), 1 for 67.2V, 1.25 for 84V ... (Profile 1)
Voltage Correction Factor (Gotway/Begode only), 1 for 67.2V, 1.25 for 84V ... (Profile 2)
Voltage Correction Factor (Gotway/Begode only), 1 for 67.2V, 1.25 for 84V ... (Profile 3)
Voltage Sag Threshold for Sag Indicator (Profile 1)
Voltage Sag Threshold for Sag Indicator (Profile 2)
Voltage Sag Threshold for Sag Indicator (Profile 3)
Gotway/Begode with custom firmware (to use hardware PWM) (Profile 1)
Gotway/Begode with custom firmware (to use hardware PWM) (Profile 2)
Gotway/Begode with custom firmware (to use hardware PWM) (Profile 3)
Speed Correction Factor, to adjust wheel reported speed. PWM will still be calculated using uncorrected speed reported by EUC. (Profile 1)
Speed Correction Factor, to adjust wheel reported speed. PWM will still be calculated using uncorrected speed reported by EUC. (Profile 2)
Speed Correction Factor, to adjust wheel reported speed. PWM will still be calculated using uncorrected speed reported by EUC. (Profile 3)
Value to display on the main numeric indicator (center of the screen) (Profile 1)
Value to display on the main numeric indicator (center of the screen) (Profile 2)
Value to display on the main numeric indicator (center of the screen) (Profile 3)
Value to display on the top bar (Profile 1)
Value to display on the top bar (Profile 2)
Value to display on the top bar (Profile 3)
Displayed speed limit : used to scale the top arc if Top bar value set to Speed (Profile 1)
Displayed speed limit : used to scale the top arc if Top bar value set to Speed (Profile 2)
Displayed speed limit : used to scale the top arc if Top bar value set to Speed (Profile 3)
Cut-out speed when performing free spin test (Profile 1)
Cut-out speed when performing free spin test (Profile 2)
Cut-out speed when performing free spin test (Profile 3)
Voltage when performing free spin test (Profile 1)
Voltage when performing free spin test (Profile 2)
Voltage when performing free spin test (Profile 3)
Power factor correction, don't touch it if you don't know what you're doing (Profile 1)
Power factor correction, don't touch it if you don't know what you're doing (Profile 2)
Power factor correction, don't touch it if you don't know what you're doing (Profile 3)
Percentage of PWM that trigger an alarm (Profile 1)
Percentage of PWM that trigger an alarm (Profile 2)
Percentage of PWM that trigger an alarm (Profile 3)
UI settings, please be aware that watch battery usage will be impacted by refresh rate (battery usage / accuracy trade-off)
Be fully aware of what you are doing here as it will impact displayed PWM value and associated alarm. Use uncorrected speed for cut-out speed variable
set the alarm threshold to 0 to disable alarms

Automatic activity recording will automatically start and save an activity when launching/exiting the app. Activity save on exit will allow manually started activities to be automatically saved when the app is exited.
Adjust voltage correction for your wheel (mandatory for the reported values to be accurate).
Ride info displayed on the bottom
Select the ride info to be displayed, if more than one selected, selected info will be diplayed in a loop every 2 sec
Display average moving speed (when speed >3 km/h or 2 mph)
